sqldiff.help: USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not fail or overwrite old data EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Mark Goodrich
diff.description: Corrects a bug in the original MDR-TB metadata package where the MDR-TB concept source didn't have a uuid
diff.sql: UPDATE concept_source SET uuid = 'ddb6b595-0b85-4a80-9243-efe4ba404eef' WHERE name='org.openmrs.module.mdrtb' and uuid = '';
